bug.author: tvst
bug.summary: Crazy error message shown when two widgets have the same key
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Run this code import streamlit as st
st.button("OK") st.button("OK")
Observe!
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
You should get one button plus an error message explaining you can't have to st.button calls with the same key. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
The error message complains about st.-3952690150221448179 ðŸ™€ See screenshot: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/690814/91766363-4f35d480-eb8f-11ea-8648-ce832caf4da3.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.65.0
